235b5: 'dod pa'i yod tan yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la gus pa bskye pa dang / theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten
235b6: cing rim 'gro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa thag ring du spong ba dang / phyir ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod brgya
235b7: chen po bshams nas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis dbul bar byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / spongs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par
235b8: byed pa dang / stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang / don zab mor yang dag par ston pa dang / gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos yang dag par ston par

236a1: byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa la chos shes pa med pa dang / spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa
236a2: dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / dge ba'i las yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /
236a3: spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dad pa bskyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du yongs su
236a4: sdud par byed pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol ba la mos pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas pa dang / rtag tu
236a5: bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang / ci tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan
236a6: cig gnas pa dang / bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas la shin tu dad pa dang / snod ma yin pa yongs su
236a7: spong ba dang / mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs nas ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la snyoms par
236a8: gyur pa dang / rtag du gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang / sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni/ gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi

236b1: thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do/ / de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mchos de lta bu thos nas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshogs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/
236b2: de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad rnam dag ye shes ston mdzad lags// rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas na// rnam dge 'od zer bun sum tshogs pa lags// de bzhin gshegs
236b3: bas reg bdag med mkhyen pas/ / de skad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags// rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na// tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyidadabun sum tshogs pa lags// bcom ldan sngon ni sems
236b4: can pan brtags pas/ / de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags// rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na// 'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dog mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas/
236b5: de slad kun 'dzin mabyed pa rdzogs pa lags// kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston// de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen// mig gi
236b6: khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma mchis/ / mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston// sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas// mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen//
236b7: ming stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa
236b8: rtogs pas na/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges pa sor// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs rdzogs pas// mig gi 'jig pa dpag med thugs su chud// mig gi 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na// 'jig rten thams cad

237a1: la ni ban 'dogs mdzad/ / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa// bdag kyang ring po mi thogs de bzhin shog/ de bzhin rna ba sna
237a2: dang lce lus yid/ / gzugs sa dri ro rig byang ga dang chos// 'jig rten ste dang sgra dang ming la sogs// thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen// thugs rje chen po nang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol byin pa pun
237a3: sum tshogs/ / ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byin// bdag kyang ring bor me thogs de bzhin shog/ zugs rje chen po dang gnyis mchog gyur pa// tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byin dang ldan// ji ltar bcom ldan tshul
237a4: khrims pha rol byin/ / bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bzod pa'i pha rol byin pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa pha rol byin// bdag kyang
237a5: ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// brtson 'grus pha rol byin pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byin// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog
237a6: thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ / bsam gtan pha rol byin pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan pasam gtan pha rol byin// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
237a7: mchog gyur ba/ / shes rab pa rol byin pa phun sum tshogs// rdo ltar bcom ldan shes rab pa rol byin// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
237a8: chos sku'i pha rol byin pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan chos su'i pha rol byin// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med

237b1: phun sum tshogs/ / ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//
237b2: ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag yid ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog
237b3: ldan pa/ / bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcon ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa// bdag kyang ring
237b4: bor mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje/
237b5: chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thigs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur ba/
237b6: sems can gdul slad srid pa gsum na bzhugs// ji ltar bcom ldan sems can gdul mdzad pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/
237b7: ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'dod chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod
237b8: 'das pa/ / bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog

238a1: thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ / gti mug spyod pa dngag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po dang gnyis mchog krung ba/
238a2: 'dod chags zhe sang spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji lta bcom ldan 'dod sngang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhi shig/ thugs rjerje dpon gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe sang gti mug spyod pa dngag ma 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan ldang rjongs spyod 'das
238a3: ba/ / bdag kyang ring por me thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rjechen pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyad 'das pa// bdag kyang ring bor mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
238a4: gyur pa/ / cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyam spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags dag las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin du phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan
238a5: 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/
238a6: 'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu
238a7: phan 'dogs mdzad/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye sheg grub par shog/ 'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas// 'jig rten kun las shin tu ban 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra
238a8: ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pas// 'jig rten kun las shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pa na 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa chags sngang gti mug spyod 'das pas// 'dzi

238b1: rten kun las shin tu phan 'dogs ma dzad/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang deng dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i
238b2: ye shes grub gyur nas/ / lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi 'alo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin
238b3: gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ / gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul
238b4: mdzad cing / / de bzhin grul bum dpag du ma mchis pa// 'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha me kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// chos rnams yang
238b5: dag don ni rab tu mkhyen/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// yang dag de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal zad mtha' mkhyen// skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dog mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//
238b6: sngagasngal zad la the tsam ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad mtha' mkhyen pas// skye dgu thams cad pa ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// nA zad de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma byin pa mchog pan
238b7: pas/ / 'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten spyod la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub/
238b8: gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten las dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grubagyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa

239a1: gsu / / su su/ u du// smra stag tu //
239a2: na su sa/ ma na sa
239a3: sa/ / sa su sa//
239a4: 'i gas rnas/ des mas da na pa mapas// sa na sbyi /
239a5: sa/ mas ga/ ga sa 'i sa pa / /
239a6: gas pa pa ga/ napas/ ma pa sa // 'i shes rdzogs// yi mas she gas pa na
239a7: rnams dag pa sa / / 'i 'i sa rdzunas// sa ma na gyi / sa/ de gshegs pa la // ban
239a8: rnams skyes pa mabye/ bad 'du migs dru zhugs// 'dzi mas ni ba go// de bani gshegs pasamams cad margya pas// ga gas pan mdas

239b1: mchis/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin rab gnas pas// khyad par thabs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'drang/
239b2: ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas//
239b3: 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes thub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
239b4: bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs/
239b5: pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
239b6: pas/ nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dri'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'khor ba nges 'byung
239b7: chos ni rab tu mkhyen/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas// sems can dpag med rnams ni go bar mdzad// bdag kyang
239b8: de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas/ / 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang // rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas//

240a1: 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi// yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan/
240a2: bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas// dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa
240a3: sku gsung thugs 'dul bas/ / thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dri ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas//
240a4: 'dzin dang chags pa mi mda' thogs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dril ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // shes rab bsgrubs pas
240a5: las ldog mi 'gyur/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas// rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'//
240a6: bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs// lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag kyang de
240a7: 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ / khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
240a8: 'gyur nas/ / khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas bajig nanamakhyen ldan pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur

240b1: nas/ 'gro ba de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// de skasrad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tsom ma mchis shon
240b2: de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas/ / de skad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// rab ni de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas
240b3: de smad de la rmongs pa'i yod mi mnga'/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'khor ba de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang byi mtha' mkhyen// de srad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan//
240b4: bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen// de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
240b5: nas/ skyon zlog de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi mtha' la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin
240b6: gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ / mig ni rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tsom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dag la
240b7: zhen pa bskyed/ / de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang shig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas//
240b8: de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig zad dang mi zad ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug dang mi

241a1: 'jug ma rtogs pa/ des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rab mkhyen pas/ de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ zhe sdang gti mug khong khro'achab pa dang / g.yo ste
241a2: phrag dog rgyal khengs pa dang sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pazugs kyis mkhyen nas/
241a3: 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer gser gyi po dog lta bu rab tu bkyo'o// 'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi ning tshad med dpag du med pa rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams de dag du pan pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum/
241a4: bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ltar sal btsugs nas/
241a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa// 'brug dang ser ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // ka la bing ka'i sgra blud pas//
241a6: chos rje chen po'i sgra byin pa// ci yi sma du 'dzum pa mdzad// ti ma stong pas byed par 'phags// rnam par skar ba dag dang ldan// yon tan ngo mtshar rab ma pa' ba// ci smad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam
241a7: gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas/ / thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pas// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pas// ngag rngub rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nad ni legs gso pa// ci slad
241a8: 'od zer bkye bar mdzad/ / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen// rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas// sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang mig

241b1: lasags pa nas/ / kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang // ye shes bzod pa'i bar de bzhin// thugs rje chen po nang gnyis gtso// mig zad skye pa'i mtha' dag dang // gzhi gnalas bdag/ thams cad stong dbar /
241b2: dum byed// rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs ra rig byanas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// gzhan man cing khral 'thung tshos// rba dang rtag pa yon pa nas// da nga /
241b3: kyis byas min pas// rkyen mang las 'byung nyid du gsung // res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis// sdug bsngal gzhini ston par mdzad// res dga' don ni sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad// ras 'ga' tshig na
241b4: mad med kyis/ / rab pan chos ni stan mdzad cing // gang zagasrog dang bdag med dang // sems pan med pa nyid du ston/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyar// bis ma gyis mi thub pa dag / tshigs su bcad pa brgya skang gas// da dz+ra/
241b5: sa nis par mdzad// de ba'adag shegs pas yin tan nas// yang dag nyid ni ldan par mdzad// brjod dang brjod bya mi ma nga bas// badz+ra man chos kyang yad mi mnga'// bcom ldan/ yang dag chos phreng zhing /
241b6: dmas nig mdzad pas// lha rnams dang ni gnad sbyin dag/ gang tham de dag rtogs par zung // l+h+wa ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos bdag ni rnam pa dag/ m-i ni mang batshan med kyang // thecom dra bachad par 'gyur// dod /
241b7: rang bzhi rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gti tsug rnam par bshig/ sred dang rgyal ma rig dang // g.yo sna phrag dog smos pa nas// sdug bsnga la phung po la sogs par// thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di la sogs pa'i
241b8: tshig gi don/ / mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la// sna tshags ming ni rab mkhyen pas// grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams// bsam gyis mi bya ba rab tu ston// sangs rgyas

242a1: tshad med mang po las/ / de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang // brjod pa thugs pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen
242a2: pas/ / ming tshig dang po par ma dang // tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na// don mchog dag ni gyi nam pa// snyan pa dag la rab tu mkhyen// de 'dra 'a dbyangs ni rnam
242a3: dag pa/ / rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas// lce 'bab zhig la rten pa nas// lus sems par la rten pa'ang min// sa ni rnam pa drug tu galos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas// thal sbyar bcom ldan nal lta na//
242a4: the tsom dag ni bsal du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas mi bzad dang // skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang // 'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas// yang das
242a5: mtha' la rab tu bzhugs/ / bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'// de las deng bdag zhu ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang // zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin stong dben rab
242a6: mkhyen pas/ / chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub pa dbyangs spyan rab mnga' bas// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben
242a7: rab mkhyen cing / / rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang // brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa
242a8: ston par mdzad/ / bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid ston dben rab mkhyen cing // nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes// grags pa mchog ni phun sum tshogs// ci slad

242b1: 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ / bcom ldan yun ring bsgoms bslabs pas// bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad// mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag/ sems kyi spyod pa chad med rnams// dgongs
242b2: pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen/ / 'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag na ni sra ba la'am//
242b3: thugs ni rtag tu ni zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis// mig zad mtha' ni u0f7f/ rgyu dang rgyan ni gang gi smad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang
242b4: ni 'byung chen pa ni/ / sgra dang ming las stsogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtog/ sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen nas// ci slad 'dzum pa ston/
242b5: par mdzad/ bcom ldan lnga la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ sems nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slang 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang martan
242b6: nyid du rtogs/ dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rol bdag med mkhyen// reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdza
242b7: bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen/ / chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan dru nga la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dngos nyid stong par rab
242b8: mkhyen nas/ / ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan khams la bdag

243a1: me ma khyen 'jig rten martag nyid du rtogs/ / sgra nyid stod par rab mkhyen na// tsa smad 'dzum bstan par mdzad// bcom ldan sbal bdag med mkhyen// ming yang matag nyid du rtogs// lam nyid stong par bam khyen nag/
243a2: slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen// rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mkhyen na// ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/
243a3: bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen// mos pa stong par rab mkhyen na// bi rmad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa steng mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzums
243a4: rton rje mdzad/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnams zol// grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang // brgya byin mi'i dbang po dang // klu'i rnams la stsogs kun gyis mchod// de bzhin gshegs pas migazad dang // skye mtha' rab dben
243a5: mkhyen lags na/ / ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras na tshad med pa// 'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus// sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang 'byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar/
243a6: mchis/ gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags// 'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni// 'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams
243a7: cad las ni yang dag 'das/ / de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni// bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongs pas rab mkhyen gyis// rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs pa gas// bcom ldan mig la bdag med
243a8: mkhyen/ ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'od med// rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po gsum pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa

243b1: skye mtha' rab zad pa/ / thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyo ba mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gnan/
243b2: yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/
243b3: mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa// mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i
243b4: gtso/ / ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas// chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab skyes pas// 'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad
243b5: du gsol/ / bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal dang pa shin tu dbyangs rab snyan// skra snyan tshad med rang gi nga gis 'byung // ci skad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol// tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yis//
243b6: rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing // ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/ ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgra// 'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa// thugs rjes tshig
243b7: rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/ / rtsa slad 'di zer gser gyi kha dag bkye// skya dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen// miganyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtog/ 'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog 'gyur ba// tsaM smad 'od zer gser gyi
243b8: kha dog bkye/ / mig gi 'byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang // 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang // smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa// rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin rnab sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs smra dri ga bya

244a1: chos rnams nas/ / sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sa dang mi 'jigs// mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun su pachogs
244a2: skul 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/ / rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlur zhing zhabs kyi gting pa ring // rgyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng gi 'dra// lte ba shin du zab cing rked rgyas pa// chu rkyen
244a3: gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ / gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs// ba s+phu ri re kha dog mthong mthang ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi dang ldan pa// rgyu t+ye gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs
244a4: rdzogs rtag gnas pa/ / dper na n+ya gro d+ha'i shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan// gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su gyi ra
244a5: gda'/ / zhing ni brgya stong dpag myed chu bar mdzad// sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad// tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra// ljags mtshan srid ri shal ni kun tu khebs// 'gram pa seng ge 'dra zhing shangs ni mtho/
244a6: thams cad thabs dang rnam dgazugs las skyes// ud pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung // tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun tu khyab// sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// de bzhin
244a7: gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin tu mnyam/ / sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par
244a8: brgyad/ / khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal// dge ba dag gis skyes dgu phan gdogs pas// gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye// sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyas ning ni dpag med

244b1: gang bar badzad/ / sngon ni dge sbyong mang bar ba bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyi dkod pa sna chags 'di ba rnyes lags// gzugs su yangs rdzogs dpa zla yad ma mchis// zhal mtshan ba mangs shin tu khyad par 'phags/
244b2: rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// ci slad 'jub pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa ri dgas en ya dang 'dra// sku dbyi ba ma mi dgu med ge ci lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//
244b3: ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'// phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus po 'das mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad
244b4: gsol/ sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing // kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis// de
244b5: 'dra'i chos 'di bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags/ / gang gis mthar lha rnams ni rab spangs nas// bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur// lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing // ka lan ta ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal
244b6: lha'i glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa/ / ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas// 'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab
244b7: gang gsungs pa/ / dkun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so// khyu mchog sprin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyam zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon ming 'dra// gtsug tor
244b8: mtshad ni mama'i lhas mi mthong / / tshems dkar bsdams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/

245a1: @// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med pun tshogs shing // 'od zer rnam dag ngo mchar rab bkye ba// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// thugs rje chen por cho//
245a2: rgyal nang gnyis gtso// sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud// thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog bsres pa// ni slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas// rig pa gsum
245a3: dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs/ / rnam da ma 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa// ni slang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// bcom ldan brgya song steng la mchod pa mdzad/
245a4: de 'dra'i rta 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba// ji skad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// ding 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas// mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen na/
245a5: ni srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// 'das pa de ni ma'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen// rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab// na spang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas
245a6: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gsar kyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ / bla nga gzhan nur byung ba'i spyi bo la bzhag nas// tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gnon shin du legs par nyon// ngas ni nga 'dir byang chub
245a7: chos/ / 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gshad kyis// mdzangs tha ma dus ngan ci// chos ni rnam par 'jig pan// khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni// rab du byanas bshad par gyis/
245a8: ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis// ma ngas tha ma dus kyiH// shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i// mad sna ma pa 'di dag la// gang mas gang ni mi mos pa// thams cad kun kya gzigs shing mkhyen// sems can dag ni gang shig gis/

245b1: byang chub la la ni rab tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing // mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis// gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing // 'du 'dzin la ni mos 'gyur dang // nyin mtshan gnyis la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//
245b2: nga yi bstan pa dag las ni// rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu thun pod dag ni// dad pas byin pa chung bzos 'gyur// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la// nyes dmigs mar
245b3: bar thos kyang ni/ / 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen na nas// 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur// chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang // de la shes rab ci yang med// thub pas
245b4: lags par gsungs pa yi/ / yang dag bka'i na gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyur na// yid ches legs par mi 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag
245b5: gal te thos par gyur nas kyang / / rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yis// sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni// ngas ni rab tu smod par byed// mi lus thob par 'gyur mod kyi// de ni don med chud zos yin// gal te shin tu
245b6: zab pa'i chos/ / 'di dag thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yis// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni// sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na// gdon mi za ba kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/
245b7: skyes bu blun po gang dag gcig/ lta ba ngan par rab spangs nas// shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i// bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/
245b8: bsten cing gus pa bskyed par bya// 'dzag rngan dag ni thams cad na// nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod dang // sems can ngan song gsum por ni// rtag tu bying par gang byed pa// thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen las

246a1: byung bas na/ / nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing // rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed// de lta bas na rmongs pa yi// skyes bu dman pas
246a2: bar bya/ / ji ltar kha lo bsgyur ba yis// rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin// mi dge las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// kha nas tshig ngan phy-ing nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa// ji ltar sta ri rno thogs
246a3: nas/ / rang gi lus ni gcod pad 'angadra // chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'i las kyi rdzas su ni// rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par// de ltar 'ong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la bsnyen nas// dge ba'i grogs po yin sum
246a4: sems/ / de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas// chad par lta ba bskyed par byed// lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang rdzas su 'gag 'gyur zhes// thal cher rgyal ba'i tshig dag
246a5: la/ / mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing // 'di la mngon par zhin pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci yang med// gal te sprul ni gdug pa yis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang // nam yang skye dgagu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed// blun po gang zhig chos
246a6: ston pa/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas// skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa// 'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis// deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dugs
246a7: 'dis ni sngon cad 'das pa yi/ / sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das// tshad med gang ga'i klung gyi stod// mchod pa rim 'gror rab byas shing // shid tu brtan par yongs bsgom nas// bla med ye shes btsal bas na// sred pa dag ni thams ci/
246a8: la// sangs kyis gnas pa ci yang med// mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni// rnam par dag pa shes pas na// spros bdag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon pa bzhin paci yang med// sems can dag ni chad med la// phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir// bla med 'od zer/

246b1: ston pa yi// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di slob par mi nus pas// rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni// skyor nyid du yang lta bar byed// de lta bas nablun po dag/ thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas// de dag la ni
246b2: bsnyen me byed/ / de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'i sbal mos pas na// rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan bslab par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la ni// tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med// de lta bas na/
246b3: de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi bya ba sngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// le lo snyom las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi// med ge'i las ni spyod pas ra// de la tshul khrims dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci yang med// rtag tu dod
246b4: pa'i yul sems shing / / 'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed// khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de// rigs dang dus dang lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khong khro ga' blo mi bde zhing // byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la// gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang // lus
246b5: de rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/ / bdag tu 'du shes la zhan pas// yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur// blo gros dag dang mi ldan pas// tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus// rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang // de la mos pa skyed mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom
246b6: ldan 'das/ / yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i// tshig gis spros pa gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin// so so'i spyi bos 'di dag la// shin tu zhen cing chags pas ni// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du yang // rtogs cing khong du chud mi 'gyur// tshul
246b7: thems bsngags pa brjod byed kyang / / tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed// kha nas chos ni sngon byed kyang // lus kyis chos min spyod par byed// rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang // rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed// sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni// kha dog bskrar pa'i
246b8: gos gyon gsungs/ / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang // ra rgyal dag ni bag med pa'i// sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci zos pa// thu lum 'bar ba med pa 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs

247a1: byaH/ / nas// 'dod pa lnga yi bde ba'ang med// gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas// spyod pa 'dren pa mos byed pas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos paji snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni
247a2: mi 'gyur/ / de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor ma nang du gnas gyur kyang // dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/ seng ge'i khrur ni zhugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi// chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang // de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i
247a3: don/ / rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas// 'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang // khengs pa'i sems ni skyed par byed// ston pa chen po mi dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang // yid bzhin nor bu
247a4: thob pa bzhin/ / shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas// sems kyis chung zad gtong mi byed// 'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag/ khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni// spyod lam dag kyang bsrung ba dang // chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang // cha byang/
247a5: tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med// kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing // dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos// log lta dag tu ltung gyur na// rab ben mya ngan 'das be'i lam// de dag rab tu
247a6: nyams par 'gyur/ / dge sbyong mngon du bya ba yi// 'bras bu dag kyang thob mi 'gyur// ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni// rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro// grong khyer dag tu rnamar+g+ha zhing // rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang // skyes bu blun po
247a7: blo med pas/ / yang dag bgrod par shes mi 'gyur// sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dge yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu// bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin
247a8: no/ / rlugs dang ga nyid la rab du dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag/ bsgrub pa la ni mos par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang // phyir log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir//

247b1: mya ngan 'das lam stong pas na// nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gis// 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing // tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan tha// de la shin tu/
247b2: sred par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bden pa rnams la ni// rtag tu sred pa bskyed par byed// gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang // nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kye las ni mi srung bas// spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed// res dag
247b3: grong khyer zhugs nas ne/ / rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag na// ri bug dag ni gang yod pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te// mthon dmanar na bang blta ba dang // 'grog ma tshul
247b4: la gnas so zhes/ / tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de// dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan thas// khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun du ni 'di skad du// dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zeng // ras 'ga' dgan pa
247b5: de dag na/ / gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe// gal te gzhan dag 'ongs grung na// 'di lta bur ni ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ci'am// yang na du 'dzag bting nas ni// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer//
247b6: des ga 'grong khyer zhags smar nas// khyim pa'i der ni byin pa'i tshe// g.yo spyanan tan 'di skad du// bde'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa yi du 'dzi'i gtam// rgyal po cho kun la sogs pa'i// sna tsogs dag ni brjod par byed//
247b7: nges 'ga' chags pa'i sems dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu// thabs ni rnam pa sno tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan brjod par byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kye// bsod nams zhing ni zin pa byed// bdag ni rgya tha/
247b8: rab spangs nas// rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin// btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang // mtho ris skyes par grur ces zer// de dag de skad thos nas ni// shin tu gus pa ba bskyed de// gos zas dang ni btung ba dag/ snga gas

248a1: sbyar nas mchod par byed/ / btsun pas thugs rjes rab dgongs shing // bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dgal zhin chags shing // nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas// bdud kyis klags
248a2: kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ / ru sbal rgya bos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang // rnyed pa dag gis bsnyems par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la// brnyas shis skur ba 'debs par byed// rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs
248a3: pas/ / yang dang yang du zhen pa skyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na// lus dang ngag gi mi dge las// yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dad pa'i
248a4: sems kyis mchod na yang / / le lo snyen las dbang gis ni// de yi bsod nams bri bar byed// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dga'i 'dod skyes bya// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la// rjes 'thun bzod sems thob mi 'gyur//
248a5: gang dag nga yi bstan pa las// nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas// nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na// chos 'di thos pa dka' mi 'gyur// rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang // stong smad sdug bsngal ba de la sogs// 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa/
248a6: chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang // phung po rma yi 'du shes dang // zas ni rma bskus 'du shes dang // chos 'di zos pa dka' mi 'gyur// gos bzang dag ni thob 'gyur kyang // grags pa dag
248a7: kyang mi skyed cing / / ngo tsha dgab pa'i phyir gyon pa// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// gzugs dang stobs ni mi bsnyems pas// zas la chags pa med pa dang // srog chags phyir ni gang zab// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur//
248a8: srid pa rnams ni stong shes nas// 'dod pa dag la blang dor med// rtag tu stong dpe na gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig 'dus ri khrod du// gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam bzhag cing // 'dus byas

248b1: bdag med ga rtog pa/ / chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'byung // mi zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed rnyi // mi gtsang lam ni gang sgrub pa// chos 'di thob pa da/ mi 'gyur// na ba sna lus dang
248b2: yid/ / gzugs sa rjer ga byanas// smadang ma bar du yang // thams cad kun kya de bzhin no// de bzhin pa 'ongs dus kyimo// dge slong dag ni tshad mau snyed// brtson pa dang ni le lodzin// thams pa da de bzhin na/
248b3: bar gyis// dge dang med go'i grogs pa // sgrub pa dang ni ma sgrub pa// len ches pa dang med ma chom// thams cad de bzhin gas par gyis// dgedang mi dga'i grogs pod// cigaza 'am ni gang yin pa/ ba hA/
248b4: mi sgrub pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang ni gi byang chub ba mos shing // zlag cig gnyis gsum 'das nas ne// dus gzhan gyi ni gang ldog pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang ni/ rtsom rje/
248b5: thob nas// mos pa'i sems ni gang rnyed ga/ gab nyenams par byung na yang // slang ni dang thob par 'azung // gang ne chos 'di thos rdzu nas// bag med spong ba mabyed pa// mdo da sangs rgyas bkang mayin/
248b6: de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di zos 'gyur nas// bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba/ dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang // phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos la ma mos pa// mi bden grags dang /
248b7: de chom// grong byer grong rnal brgyu da // gzugs rnams dang ni ti 'dzin dang // bran 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjid cang // de las yang dag togs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig na
248b8: las ni 'dod tshol ba/ / brjod pa dag ni rtags byed pas// stong nyid skom la bskur ba 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// tshe tshad rab tu don meda' das// blun po stong pa'i chos spong ba// de ni

249a1: tshul khrims bgegs byas pas/ / man med dag du ltung bar 'gyur// nam yang mtho ris yod mi ste// gang gis skad cig gcig pa ni// mchod rten stod na byas pabs/
249a2: gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bani tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig
249a3: bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags/ / gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/ gang ga'i bye snyed byas babs// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas zhing ni
249a4: 'bum phrag brgya/ / me tog gtor nas mchod babs// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// chos gos 'bum phrag brgya mang po// sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas/
249a5: gang gis za na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dga' phags// me mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med// gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par
249a6: 'gyur/ / 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pazung // nga ni bram ze'i bye'ur gyur// me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas// shAg kya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas//
249a7: mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// ngal byang chub lung yang bstan// khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur grur // nga lung bstan pa thos gyur nas// dga' zhing dang pa'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te
249a8: bram ze'i khye'u 'di/ / mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas tshe// bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing // srung bar shog ces smon lam btag/

249b1: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di na// ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe// bram ze'i khye'u gzhon nu gnyis// legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung // nga sngon 'das pa
249b2: dus kyi tshe/ / me tog ud pa la dag gis// sangs rgyas de la mtshad pa byas// de tshe khyed kyang deng 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni sbyin mam btag/ nga ye bstan pa tham la// mdo sde 'di ne ba bzung
249b3: nas/ rgya mer ston par shog ces smras// gang gis chos 'di thos byung nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi byed par // gzungs 'dzin thog cing ga 'dod pa// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// khyod kyim mdzes
249b4: dus kyi tshe/ / thos dka'i chos 'dir ba bzung nas// sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya// ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// yang dag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di
249b5: nau/ / sems can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la bskur pa 'debs pas byed// ngas ni de skad thos gyur kyang // zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed// ngas ni rtag tu bzod sgoms nas/
249b6: 'jig rten rnams la pan 'dogs byed// bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan// gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nom yongs su rdzogs 'gyur cing // gser gyi kha dag
249b7: rnam dga' phags/ / bzod pa'i stobs las 'byung bar ltos// nga yi zhabs nis reg nas// zhing ni tshad med ga yo byed kyang // sems can rnams ni me ltung ba// thams cad bzod pa'i stobs pas skyes// 6/
249b8: spu bung gcig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong rab pa kye nas// thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po bzhin du 'jigs pa gzugs// srog chags gzi byin 'phrog byed//

250a1: pa/ nga la rtag tu gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa// sems ni rab tu dul 'gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //
250a2: rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ 'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // klu 'i rgyal po brgya stong dag/ rab tu gadrug cing 'jigs rung ba/
250a3: sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po gnod sbyin las sogs pas// me tog 'phreng ba brgya'i stong thogs// 'ongs nas dal mchod byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las/
250a4: byung / zhing ni rgya stong tshad med par// bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye chen po dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong dag ni
250a5: 'dum gyur nas/ / me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po las sogs pa// bye ba brgya' phrag drug bcu rnams// 'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa// thams cad bzod
250a6: mchog stobs las byung / / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ni// ma na ba ka la sogs pas// mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya'i stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/
250a7: rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya'i stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog 'phreng ba spos kyis da mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las
250a8: byungs chen 'dzin pa klu li rgyal/ lus byed dag ni rab bstan na// thal sbyar ngal gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lus med sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgyal stong rnams// dang ba'i//

250b1: sems kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /
250b2: sam mu ta dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam mnga'ag bar ni/ spos kyi char phab mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lta ma'i khar ni brgyal stong dag/ lA yi me tog gtor mchod de// sred spangs sangs rgyas rten byed pa
250b3: thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / / khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas// thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa// bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos// phung po 'ams kyi sgra dag
250b4: dang / bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis// thams cad kun ni go mdzad pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mi gzad mtha' dag dang // ngabazhi sgra ni thos 'gyur te// skye ba'i mtha'
250b5: yang de bzhin no/ / nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen// de las skye bar dang gro 'od med// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na// sangs
250b6: rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes/ / de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs/
250b7: kyis ni/ mkha' las mig mtha' ra bzhi pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// dayi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las ma gi skyem tha' zhis// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/
250b8: de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhin/ sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas//

251a1: sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mi dben rab zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par gyur// rna ba sna
251a2: lce lus dang yid/ / gzugs skra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'dod chag gti mug khong khro dang // 'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang // khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa//
251a3: rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
251a4: sang gi gdugs la/ / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag gis spar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa
251a5: dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nur de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bas
251a6: gnang ngo / / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
251a7: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas/ rgyal po'i khab gyi grong khyer chen po'i ba ni mdor dar gyi ldeng khang bres te/ lding khang de yang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la/ thams cad kun tu khyab pa/ gser gyi cod cod dra bar bres pa/ nor bu rin po
251a8: che'i 'phreng bas sbyangs pa/ seng ge'i bdan dang gser gyi 'phreng ba lu gu rgyud can dbum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gnan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog kyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i phung po dag gcal du bkram mo// me tog tsam pa ka dag ma ti mu

251b1: la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'breng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang / rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang / 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du khyab par sbyangs shing rgyun tu bres so// gzhan yang de'i nang du khri star rnams bsham
251b2: nas/ rin po che'i spos byi li ka dang / dum tsa dang / tsan dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so// de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar //
251b3: 'an yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab bo// sa bzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram mo// de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra can 'dzin gyi bu mo grangs med tshang med
251b4: pa yang bar tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ / byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir// der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyab par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to// de nas zla 'od gnon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun tu
251b5: khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang / / gdugs tshod la bab par rig nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams sa sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su
251b6: gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang // thabs gcig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas// sgo'i them pa la nabs bzhag ma theg tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs
251b7: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ / de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur// sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par 'gyur// 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/
251b8: byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin bzang po thob par 'gyur// nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par 'gyur// bu med pa rnams ni buM yod par gyur// gos med pa rnams ni gos yod par 'gyur// rin po che med pa da

252a1: ni ri po tshe thob par byung / / nye shes med pa rnams ni nye shes dang ldan par 'byung // lus kyi rgyun thams cad kyis phongs pa rnams ni sum gyi rgya thams cad dang ldan par byung ste// gnan ma dang ba dang / wang zhwa dang / netso
252a2: dang / rma bu dag ga la sogs pa bya'i tshigs mang po rnams banin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// skra snya cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa byur ste/ gang gis skye de dag thos nas yang // yid shi du bde bar/
252a3: zu go// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rngu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis// tsam paka'i sngon gi na me dang ma bar dru nas/ sems can ba rgya sto mang po rnams ma tog yongs su dag ba ded ga dang / gzhan mang spos mchog
252a4: dpa ba krogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par to she mchod pa byas so// gzhan yang lham yin gyi bu mo bang bya/ thob pabargya stong dum mu tig dmar po dang / tsan dan gyi bye ma thogs nas// de bzhin gsheg/
252a5: ba la rab tu dga' bas// mngon par gtor to// lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang / dngul gyis rab tu rgyan pa thogs nas par snang la 'dug ste/
252a6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du 'bas pa galags so// gnan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan na gyi dang na po ci'i snod dang / gos la sogs pa'i sprin shing bcu snang tshad med dpag tu
252a7: med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ / me tog dang lo maphun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa// sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par sgrub pa/
252a8: rang gi dngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris// sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun tu khyab par gang bar mngon par sprul to// sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang // dus gcig

252b1: ku me tog thogs nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de bzhin du sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go// gang dag ci dang
252b2: smon pa de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha' las khyad par du 'phags
252b3: ba'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/ / tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas cang // chos rnam yang dag par bstan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
252b4: ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha'
252b5: las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur/ / 'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par
252b6: 'gyur/ 'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags ra bzhi
252b7: stong dben gang rtogs pa/ / yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa/
252b8: yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs

253a1: byang chubathob par gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das ni sring byer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sma ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa/ yang dag nyid rtogs byang chubathob par /
253a2: 'byur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sprini 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags rapa 'gog song dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chubathob par 'gyug/ zhe sdang gti mug khong tshwa/
253a3: 'tsho ba ser swA// g.yo sgra khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can// bye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni// skyes bu gso bdag dang dbang po drug/ yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang //
253a4: 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams dag dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin// chos rjes dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas//
253a5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa gnas par mos// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub
253a6: brnyes par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas// tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub brnyes//
253a7: bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni
253a8: grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni

253b1: grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas// bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs/
253b2: pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab brtson pas// shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shes stobs// thabs
253b3: dang gzungs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs/ / las dang rten 'byung yan lag dad dang thos// stong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rang bzhi stobs// rab dul yang dag mtha' dang dben mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang dga' dang
253b4: phan 'dogs la mos dang / / byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod tshe med// stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso// yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/
253b5: grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs na bzhag pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas// lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni rab tu
253b6: bkur/ / yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe// grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom lngaran
253b7: grong gshegs pan pa cher mdzad pas/ / lha mi 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na// bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par 'gyur// bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag tshe// rnam dag 'od zer
253b8: kun gsal ngo mtshar gyu ra/ / rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung // bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po yi// lag dang rkang gi gdub 'khor 'phreng ba dang // de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma

254a1: bkrol ba yang rang las sgra stan byung / / so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing // skad mang bkra shis mchog gis bsngags pa brjod// 'on long dbang po mtshang dbang po thob// thams cad bcom ldan khyad
254a2: 'phags 'bras bu dbang / / bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog mngon par mchod pa byas// mkha' las kun du sgra snyan byung bas na// lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gzhan yang
254a3: sems can dran pa nyams pa dag/ spros 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod// bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa// 'od zer byin gyis bde ba thob par 'gyur// skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khril bcas la// dri ma spangs
254a4: pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/ / thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de// thugs mchog zhabs la spyi btung phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam rab tshol// kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos
254a5: tsho la/ / bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas saTha yi spyod rtogs pas// 'jig rten rjes mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub
254a6: sems dpa' byin/ / rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom
254a7: ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// gang zhig migazad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zad mtha
254a8: ni lta bas na/ / shin tu dad pa rgyan mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mi gzad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang pargyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sreg pa// dge 'dun yid

254b1: ches mi 'dzags thog/ mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dad pa rgyun mi 'chang // gang zhig mig zad mtha' srid pa// tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dad pa n+dan mi
254b2: 'chang / / gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// 'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'o zhe sdang spong ba
254b3: 'gyur/ / mi gzang mthar ni lta bas ni// zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i ti mug spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig
254b4: meg zad mthar sred pa/ / byang chub ye shes dag la gnas// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// byang chub ye shes rgyan mi 'chang// mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'// 'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur
254b5: dang / / mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang // 'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang // thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig mig zad mthor sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
254b6: rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ / gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig mi mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med//
254b7: de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rje 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig dben rab
254b8: pa/ / de ni rtag tu the tsom med// dekar ba tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'bre'agrob par cug gang gnos

255a1: la srad pa/ den rtag tu the tsam med// de ltar ba tsam med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'brulatho par 'gyur/ gang shig mig zhel sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/
255a2: rnab sna lde lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro'og bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig skye dpag med gang skyed pa// ye shes dpag med skyed par byed// ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir// chos 'di
255a3: bstan pa 'dred bzhin no/ / mig zad dpag med gang shes pa// mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med thob// na bcwa phye lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro dag byanas// spadang
255a4: ming gi bar nga yang / / thams cad de bzhin spyad par yang // bcom ldan thong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni brgya stong rnyed// mkha' las chos bshad snga thos pas// sangs rgyas yon tan the tsom med// kha cig 'dod chags
255a5: sems byung yang / / sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed// gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan ste ma gyur/ kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med ye shes tshol byed cing // ma 'dres chos ni bsgrub pa
255a6: dang / nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // bsam gtan bde la mos pas na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas// dge slong 'bras bu thob snyam sems// byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // mi zad
255a7: mtha'i shes min na/ / bskang ba brgya stong sgom byed kyang // de la rnam grol ci yang med// skye ba len pa thams cad ni/ de la zhen chags bskyed par byed// gal te skye nyid stong rig na// mthong ba rnams ni yod dag 'gyur// gang shig bsam
255a8: gtan pa ni bslabs kyang / / mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na// bskal pa brgya stong sgoms kyang ni/ bsam gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur// gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob gyur kyang // zad mtha' shes pa thob mi 'gyur// zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir//

255b1: zag pa tho la rtag tu spyod// gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa// 'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med// 'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod// gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa// 'jig rten zad mtha'
255b2: sa pa med/ / 'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes byed// rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas// sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med// sems zad pa ni mi shes phyir// rtag tu sems ni zag la
255b3: spyod/ / gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas// chos zad mtha' yi shes pa med// chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod// sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang // mi zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni
255b4: ma shes phyir/ / yang dag sbyangs la gnas pa min// kha dog skur ba'i gos bgos kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin// ya rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang // mig
255b5: zad mtha' yi shes med na/ / mig zad pa ni ba shes phyir// de ni dge ba'i rigs ma yin// 'khor med dag ni bdog gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// myur du ngan 'gror lhung gyur te// 'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus// sgra yi rig pa
255b6: mkhas gyur kyang / / mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin// bzo rnams la ni mkhas grur kyang // mi gzad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes bying // de ni bzol mkhas ma yin// 'dri ba mang
255b7: la mkhas gyur cing / / yi ge gcig gis rnab 'byed kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// de ni don mthun bshad ma yin// mkhas pa'i rjes su slab byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// chos 'di rtogs par mi
255b8: 'gyu dor / / brjod pa sna tshogs chung pan dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// 'khri shing stug por lgang ba 'dra// sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing // dge dang mi dge rtags ston dang // tshig bu yi ge sgra ska dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang // mig zad

256a1: mtha' ni ma shes na/ / de dag rnams ni shes med yin// bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang // tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang // lus mnyes ngal sos chos rnams dang // ma byung dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang /
256a2: mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing // yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// bshad pa de ni don med yin// de bzhin mig ske mtha' dag dang //
256a3: rig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rnab sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing //
256a4: de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de ni rnams kyang dman pa yin// sgra bzhi dag ni 'don byed cing // gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de ni nam yang dman pa yin// de bzhin mig
256a5: skye mtha' dag dang / / mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rnab sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar
256a6: dA yang / / thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// / bam po bzhi pa// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/
256a7: r-ig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// sto dang bdag med brtogs pas/
256a8: thams cad rnam dag mig thob 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo s+thAnas// bag med pa yi bang du yang /

256b1: de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i cha// sems can dag na ched med rnyed// steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni/ sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos// kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi// dpe' zla med pa'i ming
256b2: yang thos/ kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing // 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing // nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni// rab zhi ston pa'i ming thos pa// kha cig shes
256b3: rab dag bstan nas/ / 'jig rten pa na 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas// sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig bdud ni rab tu la kyang // mkhon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos// kha cig gsung rab
256b4: chos dag gis/ / rnam grol bstan pa'i bde dag thos// kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher sgom pa'i ming dag thos// kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos gyur nas// thabs cad
256b5: rnam dag mig thob 'gyur/ / nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu// re ba lhun po'i bar du yang // thams cad gzhan du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thugs mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob 'gyur na// chos sku mngon par 'grub pa
256b6: dka' mi 'gyur/ / gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub 'gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med thob// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas/
256b7: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur// gang shig mig skye nges par thob 'gyur na// chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos ni mchog ni grub 'gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur//
256b8: gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go 'gyur nga bas// sangs rgyas rdza 'phrul 'thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs

257a1: sna ngo dag bya chos dag nas/ grwa rnams dang ni ming ga bang du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyang bar bya// de chos chen dag ni rab tu ga yos// rgya mtshod rnams kyang ni de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang lhan
257a2: mang po rnams/ / thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyur rab bcom nas// thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos// lha rnams so sor gzhal med kha zhugs nas/
257a3: phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras// 'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na// lha ma thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal mod khang gnas nas// dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du//
257a4: 'dren pa 'jig rten de dbyung shin tu legs// 'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad// mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas//
257a5: 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// byad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad
257a6: zer/ / sum cu rtsa gsupa lhas ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra sAn sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren bzung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad med// 'thab bral lha dag / de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shan
257a7: dradang ba skyes/ / khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjo nas// 'dre rab byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// bdag cag byang chub sems ni rabaskyed nas// bcom ldan pa med mkhyen la nye bar bgyi// lha mi'i gtso mchog sa ni brten nas mu/
257a8: sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zed// dga' ldan lha rnams de da thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra sman sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig/

257b1: rten pa na mdza zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bskal pa bye bar ni// spyad mchog byang 'bags dpag med pa dor bsgrubs nas// sems can bsdug bsngal bal ba lam bstan// 'bar ba bskal nas mya ngan 'das pa bkod// 'bral
257b2: ngana'i lharnams de skad thos nan/ / thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra stan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dron pa byung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad zer// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lhas ni de thos das//
257b3: bams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'bags sgra stan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad zer// de bzhin gshegs pa bye shi 'das pan// bdud dang bre stegs pang po 'bab
257b4: par ma dzang / bar byang chub dag ni yangs rdzogs nas// skye dgra drangs nas par la 'jo ba zhes zer// tshangs rig lha rnams dkad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// kyang 'phags shA snyan sangs rgyas
257b5: sngags brjod nas/ / 'dren pa thung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad zer// de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad// rung dpung
257b6: 'jigs sgrag mya ngan byed ces zer/ / sred pa'i rtse mo ltar 'dram // sangs rgyas byung bas 'jig/ rten pa na mdzad thos// de bzhin lha ni kun tu grags pas na// lha ma yin rnams 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel// 'drang gyi'ang
257b7: pa dag ni yongs stongs shing / / lha rnams 'khor ni btu rgyas par 'gyur// mi 'gas skabs kyis lag tshogs dab 'dul nas// byang chub chen pa'i mchog na myung dra ba rnyes// de bzhin skang gcig lung tsam lhan pas kyis/
